mapper.select:
SELECT E.ID, E.TOPIC, E.ITEMS, E.ANSWER, E.CREATED_AT, T.NAME as name FROM T_SES_EMS_EXAM_QUESTION E, T_SES_EMS_EXAM_QUESTION_TYPE T WHERE E.PERSON_TYPE = 1 AND E.KIND = #{kind} AND E.QUESTION_TYPE_ID = T.ID
AND E.TOPIC LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{topic}), '%')
AND E.QUESTION_TYPE_ID = #{questionTypeId}
ORDER BY E.QUESTION_TYPE_ID ASC, E.CREATED_AT DESC

SELECT E.ID, E.TOPIC, E.ITEMS, E.ANSWER, E.CREATED_AT, T.NAME FROM T_SES_EMS_EXAM_QUESTION E, T_SES_EMS_EXAM_QUESTION_TYPE T WHERE E.PERSON_TYPE = 1 AND E.QUESTION_TYPE_ID = T.ID AND E.QUESTION_TYPE_ID IN (1,2) ORDER BY E.CREATED_AT DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT E1 ."ID", E1 .TOPIC, E1 .ITEMS, E1 .ANSWER, T1 ."NAME", T1."ID" as tid FROM T_SES_EMS_EXAM_QUESTION E1, T_SES_EMS_EXAM_QUESTION_TYPE T1 WHERE E1.QUESTION_TYPE_ID = T1."ID" AND E1 .QUESTION_TYPE_ID =#{questionTypeId} AND E1 .PERSON_TYPE = 1 AND E1 .KIND = #{kind} ORDER BY dbms_random.VALUE
) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{queNum}
